DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety of the designed LMP1－CAR －T cells and determine whether the CAR-T cells are effective in the treatment of EBV associated malignant tumors.
DOC.brief_title: A New EBV Related Technologies of T Cells in Treating Malignant Tumors and Clinical Application
DOC.detailed_description: Half of the patients will treat with LMP1-CAR-T cells,while the other half will receive a placebo.During the time of the treatment ,we will supervise the side effect of treated group.At last we compare the survival rate and health condition of the two groups.
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of nasopharyngeal carcinoma •pregnant woman severe autoimmune diseases serious infection
